price: 7. Nanu diggah baaxô bagul eneyyi ittam baaxoh bila abneeh teetil yan marah tuxxiq abne, mcqc taamah keenik yayse maraa kee uma taamah keenik gaca mara keenik mokkorraah naaxigemkeh.
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا مَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ زِينَةٗ لَّهَا لِنَبۡلُوَهُمۡ أَيُّهُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnā mā ʿalā al-arḍi zīnatan lahā linabluwahum ayyuhum aḥsanu ʿamalan
